Job Description:
OnlinXP IT Services is hiring talented & experienced Php Developer with the experience in Wordpress ,  Codeigniter ,  Core PHP.

Skills for PHP Web Developer: 

Ability to understand and implement MVC structure and flow in various projects. Strong knowledge of PHP frameworks like Codeigniter or Laravel is a must. Ability to handle MySQL databases ,  database design and SQL queries. Demonstrable knowledge of basic web technologies including HTML ,  CSS ,  Javascript ,  AJAX ,  Solid foundation in HTML5 ,  CSS3 and JQuery across multiple devices is a must for both WordPress Developers and PHP (Codeigniter) Developers. For PHP Developers knowledge of any other framework or CMS like Drupal ,  CakePHP ,  Magento etc. is a big plus+ Create WordPress website concepts for new clients. Ability to hand code custom themes and plugins for WordPress. Ability to implement WordPress themes and third party plugins. Desired Candidate Profile
